GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: clcdfb: Fix refcount leak in clcdfb_of_vram_setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 51eb1bb6baeb478538dd4ec6459fd68c44a855b1, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit d10715be03bd8bad59ddc50236cb140c3bd73c7b. For more details please see the references link.
